name: weekendhw.roshamboapi
description: This weekend I want you all to attempt making a Roshambo API (Rock-Paper-Scissors). The actual gameplay route is extra credit because this has a lot packed into it, but I think it's doable Because this one has a bit more going on than usual lets aim to have this in before next Thursdays class - take a couple of extra days to ask questions if needed :slightly_smiling_face:
